private_settings.name: link_users_in_service
private_settings.title: Link Contacts in Hubspot
private_settings.description: Do you want to let Hull associate Contacts and Companies in Hubspot?

private_settings.name: link_users_in_hull
private_settings.title: Link users in Hull
private_settings.description:
Do you want to let Hubspot update links between Users and Accounts in Hull? Be careful about conflicts with other connectors that would link users too.

**IMPORTANT:** when this checkbox is checked the connector will create a Hull Account for EVERY Hubspot Company any Contact is linked to (refer to documentation for more details).
